DOC.brief_summary: A single centre randomised controlled trial investigating the influence of a novel prematuration system (PMS) using a phosphodiesterase-3 inhibitor for in-vitro maturation of oocytes - pilot study.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of a Prematuration Culture With a Phosphodiesterase-3 Inhibitor (PDE3-I) on Embryonic Aneuploidy Rate and Developmental Potential
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers, either with PCOS/PCOSlike ovaries, or with normal ovaries, who undergo oocyte donation for research AFC at least 10 AMH: > 5 Î¼g/L Female age < 36 years major uterine or ovarian abnormalities
